Title: Establishes the New York state violence in mass media research program
Summary: Establishes the New York state violence in mass media research program to study the effects of mass media reporting on violent crimes.
LawCode: Add ยง239-d, Ed L; amd ยง97-j, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state violence in mass media research program
